

/////////////////////////////////
//
// duel configuration file
//
// "22.0" is standard starting pitch for duels
//
// both players should be on the same level 
//
// ranges should be around:
//   close: 60.0
//   mid: 420.0
//   long: 1200.0+
//
/////////////////////////////////////////
